document.full_text: a traveling photo exhibit of 98 u.s. military from nebraska and western iowa killed in the afghanistan and iraq wars has inspired its creators to put together similar displays across the country.
document.title: nebraska couple create photo exhibits of u.s. war dead
lines_and_colors: a traveling photo exhibit of 98 u.s. military from nebraska and western iowa killed in the afghanistan and iraq wars has inspired its creators to put together similar displays across the country.
